p: Analgesic effect of bark extract (ZAB) and crude alkaloids (ZABA) was also evaluated in a similar manner. The effect was significant in pain reduction in mice. The effect of extract ZAB at 300 mg/kg dose showed a significant effect (p < 0.01) and ZABA at 100 mg/kg showed a significant effect (p < 0.01). The effect of extract (ZAR) and (ZARA) was noted and shortly the pain-reducing ability was less significant. TableÂ 5.
